Container.Name: FileShare
Container.Overview:
FileShare is a temporary file sharing application that allows users to upload files, generate public shareable links, and automatically delete files after a specified time.
Features: - Upload files via drag-and-drop or file browser - Configurable deletion times (10 minutes, 1 hour, 24 hours, 7 days) - Shareable links for easy file distribution - Automatic cleanup of expired files - Beautiful, user-friendly interface
NOTE: This container requires a PostgreSQL database. Either: 1. Install the PostgreSQL container first, OR 2. Use an external PostgreSQL instance (configure DATABASE_URL)
Container.Requires: PostgreSQL database (install postgres:16-alpine container or use external instance)

Config.Name: Upload Storage
Config.Description: Directory where uploaded files are stored

Config.Name: DATABASE_URL
Config.Description: PostgreSQL connection string. Format: postgresql://user:password@host:port/database. IMPORTANT: Change the password!

Config.Name: SESSION_SECRET
Config.Description: Secret key for session encryption (REQUIRED). Generate a random 32+ character string. You can use: openssl rand -base64 32

Config.Name: TZ
Config.Description: Timezone for log timestamps and cron scheduler
